subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Cadel Evans, 34, is the oldest man in 88 years to win the prestigious cycling event. He finished second in 2007 and 2008.
snippet: Cadel Evans, 34, is the oldest man in 88 years to win the prestigious cycling event. He finished second in 2007 and 2008.
